mapper.select: SELECT VI_ITEMS.tarifaxdia FROM VI_ITEMS WHERE VI_ITEMS.id = #{id};
SELECT items.*, VI_TIPOITEM.id AS tipoitem_id, VI_TIPOITEM.descripcion AS tipoitem_descripcion FROM VI_ITEMS AS items JOIN VI_TIPOITEM WHERE items.id = #{id} GROUP BY items.id;

SELECT items.*, VI_TIPOITEM.id AS tipoitem_id, VI_TIPOITEM.descripcion AS tipoitem_descripcion FROM VI_ITEMS AS items JOIN VI_TIPOITEM LEFT JOIN VI_ITEMRENTADO AS item_rentado ON items.id = item_rentado.ITEMS_id WHERE item_rentado.ITEMS_id IS NULL GROUP BY items.id;
